timeline.message:
Fix a master->7.x serialization bug

`master` wasn't sending `auto_date_histogram`'s
`minimumIntervalExpression` over the wire to `7.x` nodes even though
everything above `7.3` expected it. We never noticed this because we
didn't have any yml tests for `auto_date_histogram` until I added some
in #54161.

Closes #54396

timeline.bodyText: I'm moving these below the ctor to make me feel better.
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: I'm moving this up under the reading ctor so it is easier to compare.
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: Changing this from 8_0_0 to 7_3_0 is the actual fix.
timeline.author: nik9000
